remarks: Converse of the value of the map defined by ~ df-mapd .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mapdcnvcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdcnvcl.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdcnvcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdcnvcl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdcnvcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
mapdcnvid1N $p |- ( ph -> ( `' M ` ( M ` X ) ) = X ) $.
